attributes.additional_details: Stop the suffering, persecution and prosecution of people who use cannabis as a beneficial medicine. A royal commission on the therapeutic benefits of cannabis should be set up. Also an inquiry into the deliberate blocking and boycotting of cannabis use by the Alcohol,Tobacco,petrochemical and pharmaceutical industries lobbyists. Cannabis is one of the safest substance known to man- no deaths have ever been attributed to cannabis use. Recent medical studies have even shown cannabis kills cancer cells and tumors. STOP THE LIES...
